summary: An electric blue recolor of my gilded ebony set
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve moved all of the variations into one file, which can be found in the following link for those who are interested.
+Link is: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7110


This is done for a requested recolor of my gilded ebony set that I recently finished, should contain all ebony armor and weapons pieces besides the daedric reward for both male and female (which can be found in the link above).

 Added the glow maps and meshes to use them! please leave a comment about it if you have any ideas/requests for the glows. If you would like a specific color of glow either leave a comment, or go get nifskope (free) and go into the meshes files from the download and change the color and saturation to whatever you would want them to be (maybe 10 minutes for the entire set).


Feel free to make a request for a recoloring of your choice.

Please leave a comment after trying this out and endorse if you liked it!

Installation
-Drag and drop the textures folder into your data folder, located in your skyrim root folder
-Merge folders
(or use NMM)

Other mods:
Enhanced glass armor: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1985
Enhanced glass weapons: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2168

Legal:
-Don\'t upload any of my files anywhere without my permission.
-Don\'t change any of my files and claim them as your own without my permission.
-Respect that I have devoted a lot of time to this mod, do not steal my work.
author: Linkcube

files.name: Electric Blue Ebony Set
files.changelogHtml: Released both light blue and dark blue colors

files.name: Dark Blue Ebony set
files.changelogHtml: Released both light blue and dark blue colors

files.name: Electric Glow
files.changelogHtml: Added glow maps and meshes to use them, giving a glow to the armor
